TopicTitle: would someone send me a copy of jre1.7.0_09-c.msi?

Articles.Content:
I cannot update java because of its odd reliance on this MSI, which is absent on my system. Located in USER/Appdata/LocalLow/Sun/Java/jre1.7.0_09

Edited August 31, 2013 by Galacticruler

Ok, but you will have to create the jre folder manually if you don't have it already, I can't upload it all, only the files inside.

There are two files, this one http://www./download/dwxdkc70x6m8vhi/lzma.dll

and another one which is an irrelevant image file.
I already have the DLL, not the image or the MSI it wants. HOWEVER, disregard thi topic, as I found a way to do it.
